content.text:
# List of Pennsylvania state historical markers in Erie County

__NOTOC__
This is a list of the Pennsylvania state historical markers in Erie County.
This is intended to be a complete list of the official state historical markers in Erie County, Pennsylvania by the Pennsylvania Historical and Museum Commission (PHMC). The locations of the historical markers, as well as the latitude and longitude, as provided by the PHMC's database, are included when available. There are 53 historical markers located in Erie County.
